introduction: SYNOPSISMr. Jin is the head of a Taiwanese shipbuilding company. Pang, who is the vice president of the company, kills Mr. Jin and plans to kidnap his daughter Li-hwa. He gets Ma Chon-su, the head of a Hong Kong mafia to kidnap Li-hwa and have her sign over her inherited fortune to him. But Kim Min-wuk, a mysterious man and Sung-hi, Li-hwa's friend go on the search for Li-hwa. When they are locked in a hotel bathroom by Ma Chon-su, Ae-ri, Kim Dal-su's mistress, rescues them. When Li-hwa is about to turn over her fortune to Pang, Min-wuk saves her just in time. Everyone is arrested and it is revealed that Min-wuk is a member of the Interpol.故事女儿贵族的真理愤怒jinhoejang台湾船舶工业国际知名团伙在香港建立一个法律文件，等级与jinhoejang的文件的副总裁是杀死jinhoejang隐蔽在韩国一起研究劫持真相生气唯一的财产继承人遗弃的财产达宁ssangryong由当时的老板马川达绑架磨浆机。为了抢救和gimminuk磨浆不伦不类一个minuk宋 - 熙和渗透釜山酒店将失败，并用卡的在马川gimdalsu政府的数量的诡计浴室的帮助下救出时，林依晨等待死亡。被和平者所吸引的利瓦，当他遭受酷刑的威胁时签署放弃财产的文件。所有各方都被警方逮捕，他们知道，Minwook是来自韩国的刑警组织。
